plot: Brady has liked Julie for a very long time, and finally gets the courage to tell her in spite of potentially destroying their friendship and the dynamic of the group of friends.
title: Jules & Me
plot_es: Brady has liked Julie for a very long time, and finally gets the courage to tell her in spite of potentially destroying their friendship and the dynamic of the group of friends.
plot_en: Brady has liked Julie for a very long time, and finally gets the courage to tell her in spite of potentially destroying their friendship and the dynamic of the group of friends.
